entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Pemberton
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and afternoon. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 04 January 2023
